original: intros d0 d1 a0 a1 t Hcomp Hrec1 Hrec2. unfold reconnaissance. apply rec_dta with (ladj := iad_conv a0 a1). - destruct Hcomp as [Hcomp_state _]. apply Hcomp_state with (s0 := lst_rm_hd (essence t d0)) (s1 := lst_rm_hd (essence t d1)). + apply Hrec1. apply semantic_equiv_0. auto. + apply Hrec2. apply semantic_equiv_0. auto. - simpl. apply rec_st with (l := lst_rm_hd (essence t d0)). + apply Hrec1. apply semantic_equiv_0. auto. + apply Hrec2. apply semantic_equiv_0. auto.
